name: Cheers
headline: Frontline reviews, payments, & referrals in a tap
description: Cheers is the first Frontline Experience Management platform that transforms every in-person service moment into a genuine human connection. By unifying onsite payments, digital tips, real-time reviews, and new-customer referrals in one frictionless flow, Cheers helps companies 10x their online 5‑star ratings, reduce churn, and drive more revenue. Already, 8,500+ frontline employees use Cheers daily to feel valued, delight customers, and give businesses the insights to keep raising the bar.

founders.name: Dylan Allen, Founder
founders.description: Dylan Allen is the CEO & Founder of Cheers. Previously, Dylan interned at Microsoft Azure and other Utah-based B2B Tech companies as a product manager & software engineer. Dylan graduated Cum Laude from BYU with a degree in computer science, and originally hails from Dallas, Texas.

## Cheers Is Built for YOUR In-Person Business
From field services to self-storage to hospitality and retail, Cheers is designed with your specific use case in mind.

Instant Lead Generation:Transform every interaction into a sales opportunity. Collect leads on-the-spot through NFC badge taps, effortlessly expanding your customer base.
Proactive Issue Resolution:Address customer concerns in real-time. Immediate feedback alerts allow you to resolve issues promptly, enhancing satisfaction and loyalty.
Boost Employee Engagement:Empower your staff with tools that showcase their contributions. Increased visibility and recognition boost morale and drive better performance.

**1. Field and Home Services:** _Empower technicians with instant verification and easy review collection._
**2. Self-Storage and Facility Management:** _Simplify employee identification, gather real-time feedback._
**3. Hospitality and Retail:** _Capture immediate customer sentiment, encourage repeat visits._

generated_description:
Cheers is a fresh and innovative player in the world of Frontline Experience Management, founded in 2024 and proudly part of Y Combinator Batch S24. Based in San Francisco, this nimble startup, with a team of just two, is already making waves by redefining how in-person service interactions are managed. 

At its core, Cheers integrates reviews, payments, and customer referrals all in one seamless process. This means that businesses can transform every service moment into genuine human connections. Cheers aims to help companies dramatically enhance their online ratings (think 10x increase in 5-star reviews) while simultaneously cutting down on customer churn and boosting revenue.

Imagine a world where each employee feels valued, where customers can easily provide feedback, and where businesses gain actionable insights to consistently elevate their service standards. Over 8,500 frontline employees use Cheers daily, leveraging NFC technology to request reviews instantly, promoting immediate customer interactions, and creating new leads effortlessly.

Cheers is not just about the tech—it's about building trust and confidence between businesses and their customers. The platform supports a wide spectrum of industries, including field services, self-storage, hospitality, and retail, making it relevant across the board.

With supportive guidance from Dalton Caldwell, their Group Partner at Y Combinator, Cheers is on a mission to streamline frontline operations while enhancing employee engagement. Their approach is tailored to meet the specific needs of businesses and aims to deliver real results.

If you want to see how Cheers can elevate your in-person interactions and boost your customer experience, check out their [website](https://www.cheers.tech), where you can book a demo and dive deeper into the potential of their platform.
